Params[3]: How she was born and grew up. All the time she spent in this city in the sea.
Everyone looked and laughed at her as if she was a monkey.
Lamia always thinks she is too foolish for Atlantis. An unneeded presence. From then on, Lamia becomes constrained and introverted, fearing that her actions would annoy anyone.
That woman named Lustrous in particular.
She never showed her a good face.
Lamia vaguely remembers that the cold war between her and Lustrous lasted a long time, until an inevitable event took place.
She still remembers that day when the entire Atlantis was shaken by the screeching alarm.
It is said that a virus named "Punishing" has swept the entire world during the submergence of Atlantis.
